short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Checks whether your favorite streams are online

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Right click on a twitch stream channel and select "Track/don't track this stream". This extension automatically adds it to a list of streams to watch, and notifies you when a stream you are tracking goes live, through a popup that appears by clicking on a button on the top right corner of your screen. It checks the stream once every 20 seconds.
